title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: White linen foundation forms the design. Ground of drawn work embroidered with red silk. Symmetrical convetionalized floral groups, with one central branch and  two flanking branches.
